question: Show all the movies and TV shows in the fantasy genre.
sql_query1:
SELECT Movie.title as title
FROM Movie
WHERE Movie.genre = "Fantasy"
UNION
SELECT Tv_Show.showName as title
FROM Tv_Show
WHERE Tv_Show.genre = "Fantasy"
sql_query2:
SELECT Movie.title as title
FROM Movie
UNION
SELECT Tv_Show.showName as title
FROM Tv_Show
WHERE Tv_Show.genre = "Fantasy"
interpretation1: Show all the fantasy movies and fantasy TV shows.
interpretation2: Display all the movies of any genre and just the fantasy TV shows.
